channel.title: Dragonlance-Sync
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: Annette Fantine Dominic
item.description:
Personality Traits: Cheerful, hardworking, and optimistic. She often tries to see the bright side of things.
Ideals: Knowledge and improvement. She strives to become a great mage and make her father proud.
Bonds: Deeply cares for her friends and her uncle, Baron Dominic. She is particularly close to Mercedes.
Flaws: Overly self-critical and tends to overwork herself to the point of exhaustion.
Backstory: Annette is the niece of Baron Dominic and a former student of the School of Sorcery in Solamnia. She left her studies there due to a falling out and joined the Officers Academy at Garreg Mach Monastery, where she became a member of the Blue Lions. Annette is determined to prove her worth and make her estranged father proud of her accomplishments.
Status: Alive
item.guid: NPCs/Holy Kingdom of Solamnia/Annette Fantine Dominic.md

item.title: Ashe Ubert
item.description:
Personality Traits: Honest, polite, and dedicated. Ashe values hard work and integrity.
Ideals: Justice and protection. He dreams of becoming a knight who can protect the weak.
Bonds: Deep loyalty to Lord Lonato, who adopted him, and close friendships with his classmates.
Flaws: Naive and sometimes overly idealistic. He can be too trusting of others.
Backstory: Ashe was an orphan who was adopted by Lord Lonato after his parents passed away. He learned to read and write thanks to Lonato and dreamed of becoming a knight. After Lonato's rebellion and subsequent death, Ashe struggled with his conflicting feelings but continued his studies at Garreg Mach Monastery as a member of the Blue Lions, hoping to honor Lonatoâ€™s memory by becoming a knight.
Status: Alive

item.title: Holy Kingdom of Solamnia
